Translation.Text: The transformation matrix string from the iTero file is empty. A non-empty string containing 16 doubles is expected.
The transformation matrix string is in an invalid format: A non-empty string containing 16 doubles is expected. Given: {0}
No material mapping for the material {0} defined in the iTero project. Tooth ID {1}
An error occurred parsing the margin line data: File: {0}.
The material list in the iTero project is incomplete. Therefore the original material name cannot be determined.

Different materials are specified in the iTero project for a tooth group listed below, although for each group only a single material can be used in DentalCAD. Please choose a material for reconstructions.
In order to continue, you need to select a material for each tooth group.
Tooth {0}: The material defined in the project to import is not mapped. The default material will be used instead.
Tooth {0}: The material defined in the project to import is not mapped. The first material defined for the restoration will be used.
